message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I don't think it's worth more than that.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $120.  Would you be willing to meet at $130?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
